column4: Is there a way to password protect a single folder, so if someone gets onto my account, they cannot access a directory tree without the password?
you can encrypt it or something but if they have your password you have bigger worries
It isn't so much they having my password, she is at my house all the time, so she has access to my computer, if I fall asleep, I don't want her snooping through certain folders.
vesa will work for most stuff
